item.title: Android + IOIO + Range Finder
item.description: Ultrasonic and Infrared distance detection with Android and IOIO. This article will demonstrate a basic proximity and ranging accessory for Android over USB (or Bluetooth). For additional background information on interfacing Android with IOIO, check out my other introductory tutorials: Android + IOIO + Simple Digital Output Android + IOIO + Simple Digital Input Android + IOIO + Simple Analog Output Android + IOIO + Simple Analog Input
